tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE data_trends_quality_issues (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_description TEXT,
  detected_at TIMESTAMP,
  severity ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
  affected_product VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE quality_issues (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  description TEXT,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  detection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT REFERENCES quality_issues(id),
  trend VARCHAR(100),
  analysis_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE data_sources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_name VARCHAR(100),
  data_type VARCHAR(50),
  source_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE issue_comments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT REFERENCES quality_issues(id),
  commenter VARCHAR(100),
  comment_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DataTrendAnalysis (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE QualityIssues (
	issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	issue_description TEXT,
	severity TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE DataSources (
	source_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	source_name TEXT,
	sensor_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TrendPatterns (
	pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	pattern_description TEXT,
	category TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE IssueLogs (
	log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	issue_id INT,
	date_logged TIMESTAMP,
	resolved BOOLEAN
)
